discourse_list.title: Airdrop #2 is directely send to wallets. Stay away from scams

content.content: There’s nothing to claim. Stay away for scammers. They are sending OP tokens to qualify addresses. To sum up wallets qualify if: 1- #(OP delegated on gov.) x #(days staying delegated) is at least 2000 2- If a wallet has spent at least 6,10 USD in GAS fees on Optimism If a wallet is in any of 1 or 2 cases, then there are some bonuses. See oficial documentation here and good luck:   Optimism Docs   Airdrop 2 Background Optimism’s Airdrop #1 distributed over 200m OP tokens to 250,000 early adopters and engaged users in May 2022. With the introduction of OP, the Collective set out to est

My address is one the list of eligible addresses for Airdrop 2 with ~17OP slated to be sent my way. However even though I’ve got the OP token already in my wallet (earned the airdrop for a decent sized buy a while back and delegating my votes) I haven’t seen the airdrop arrive. Any idea why this would be? Much appreciated if you’re able to help!
If you have previously delegated, tokens deposited to your account are automatically delegated. Confirm this on Optimistic Ethereum L2 Explorer.
Loved the Airdrop, rewarded the Optimism Gs. Would have liked “voting yourself” to be valued more, at-least as much as delegating.  Don’t punish the users that like to vote themselves.
This problem would really be more convenient and better solved in Discord If you do have eligibility for airdrop, but didn’t get it, maybe there really is a bug

leifonearth:  My address is one the list of eligible addresses for Airdrop 2 with ~17OP slated to be sent my way. However even though I’ve got the OP token already in my wallet (earned the airdrop for a decent sized buy a while back and delegating my votes) I haven’t seen the airdrop arrive.   Do you mean you can’t find the Tx? Check on Optimism Scan, but you need to click on the “erc20 token Txns” option to see it.

TheDoctor:  There’s nothing to claim. Stay away for scammers. They are sending OP tokens to qualify addresses. To sum up wallets qualify if: 1- #(OP delegated on gov.) x #(days staying delegated) is at least 2000 2- If a wallet has spent at least 6,10 USD in GAS fees on Optimism If a wallet is in any of 1 or 2 cases, then there are some bonuses. See oficial documentation here and good luck:   thanks for the information, there are a lot of scammers, sorry for uneducated people
@Orr there is a lot of deception, you need to read trusted sources and there will be no problems
@Sidorchu we are responsible for our own money, be careful friends

i feel so thank for op foundation. it was so convienent.
It was totally a surprise! I got surprised!  I love how Airdrop #2 was delivered. OP has really matured and is ready for the Big Leap!
Feedback on Airdrop #2 can be shared here
